Name: Prefrontal-Subcortical Pathways Mediating Successful Emotion Regulation
ReferencesAndLinks: Wager, T.D., Davidson, M.L., Hughes, B.L., Lindquist, M.A., Ochsner, K.N. (2008). Prefrontal-subcortical pathways mediating successful emotion regulation. Neuron, 59(6):1037-50. doi: 10.1016/j.neuron.2008.09.006
